desc: This method posts a message to a public channel, private group, or IM channel.

channel.desc: Channel, private group, or IM channel to send message to. Can be an encoded ID, or a name. See below for more details.

text.desc: Text of the message to send. See below for an explanation of formatting.

as_user.desc: Pass true to post the message as the authed user, instead of as a bot

parse.desc: Change how messages are treated. See below.

link_names.desc: Find and link channel names and usernames.

unfurl_links.desc: Pass true to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content.

unfurl_media.desc: Pass false to disable unfurling of media content.

icon_url.desc: URL to an image to use as the icon for this message

icon_emoji.desc: emoji to use as the icon for this message. Overrides icon_url.

errors.channel_not_found: Value passed for channel was invalid.
errors.not_in_channel: Cannot post user messages to a channel they are not in.
errors.rate_limited: Application has posted too many messages, read the Rate Limit documentation for more information
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
